Projects

AWS Serverless Website

  • Deployed a website to host my own personal resume to gain hands-on experience with AWS cloud services and serverless architecture.
  • Utilised Amazon S3, CloudFront, Route 53, Certificate Manager for content hosting, distribution and routing.
  • Created microservice to keep track of webpage views on the website using API Gateway, Lambda, DynamoDB written in Python (boto3) and JavaScript.
  • Translated AWS Serverless website architecture to Infrastructure as code model via Terraform to allow for faster deployment and scalability if required.
  • Stored Terraform code and website code on repositories hosted by Github as a form of source control
  • Constructed CI/CD pipeline using Github Actions to update the website on respository code commits
  • Link to project: https://github.com/kelvinloo/aws-cloud-resume-terraform

Inventory management workshop

Built event-driven architecture on AWS using Amazon SQS, SNS, EventBridge and Lambda.
